name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_buildResponseForQuestion
description: Given a question, builds the appropriate CDT type to populate a response
sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: ri!labelValuePairs,
  expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM:QNM}AS_GCM_QNM_Response'(
    fieldKey: ri!fieldKey,
    label: fv!item.label,
    value: fv!item.value
  )
)
